</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Particles </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set interval of emitting particles from particle source. In Arma 3 hardcoded limit of how many particles can exist at the same time is [http://forums.bistudio.com/showthread.php?177797-Ruin-your-copy-of-Arma-and-your-PC#post2691090 18000]. Correspondence between CfgCloudlets class param name and command param:
<code>particleSource [[setDropInterval]] interval;</code></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> particleSource '''setDropInterval''' interval </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> particleSource: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> interval: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_source [[setDropInterval]] 0.05;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[drop]], [[setParticleParams]], [[setParticleRandom]], [[setParticleFire]], [[setParticleCircle]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
